Title: Prohibits the sale or lease of any property in the state to the People's Republic of China or the Chinese communist party
Summary: Prohibits the sale or lease of any property in the state to the People's Republic of China or the Chinese communist party.
LawCode: Add Art 17 ยง530, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting the sale or lease of any property in the state by the People's Republic of China or the Chinese communist party
